e they were inside, he shut the hatch and turned back to Blacknightmare.  S=
he was still crying, he rested a hand on her shoulder to try and calm her d=
own.

 either, your sis would pound me, I just know it," Malice said, trying to c=
heer her up a little.

tmare:
